Uses of Interface
peregrine.io.chunk.ChunkWriter

Packages that use ChunkWriter
peregrine.io.chunk Code for dealing which chunks (which are fragments of partition files). 
peregrine.io.partition Code for writing partition files which are automatically written to the correct hosts and split into chunks. 
peregrine.reduce Handles sorting, merging, and reducing shuffle data. 
peregrine.reduce.merger Merge engine for the reducer. 
 

Uses of ChunkWriter in peregrine.io.chunk
 

Classes in peregrine.io.chunk that implement ChunkWriter
 class DefaultChunkWriter
           Write key/value pairs to a given file on disk and include any additional metadata (size, etc).
 

Uses of ChunkWriter in peregrine.io.partition
 

Classes in peregrine.io.partition that implement ChunkWriter
 class DefaultPartitionWriter
          Write a partition as a given stream of key/value pairs and rollover chunks as they are filled.
